statements: SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT influencer_name, total_followers FROM Influencers WHERE collaboration_type = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM Influencers ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, partnership_status FROM Influencers WHERE total_followers > 10000;
SELECT COUNT(influencer_id) AS total_influencers FROM Influencers WHERE sponsored_content = TRUE;
SELECT influencer_name, total_followers FROM Influencers WHERE partnership_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE total_followers > 100000 ORDER BY total_followers DESC, influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM Influencers WHERE collaboration_type = 'Fashion' AND sponsored_content = TRUE;
SELECT influencer_name, partnership_status FROM Influencers WHERE total_followers BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY partnership_status ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, collaboration_type FROM Influencers WHERE partnership_status = 'inactive' AND total_followers < 50000 ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, category FROM Influencers WHERE category = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, category, sponsored_content FROM Influencers JOIN Collaborations ON Influencers.influencer_id = Collaborations.influencer_id WHERE sponsored_content = true;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, category, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, blogger_id, partnership_details FROM Influencers i JOIN Collaborations c ON i.influencer_id = c.influencer_id WHERE c.sponsored_content = TRUE;

SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, COUNT(collaboration_id) AS num_collaborations FROM Influencers i LEFT JOIN Collaborations c ON i.influencer_id = c.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name ORDER BY num_collaborations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, platform FROM Influencers WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT brand_name, collaboration_date FROM Brands b JOIN Collaborations c ON b.brand_id = c.brand_id ORDER BY collaboration_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, platform FROM Influencers
SELECT brand_id, brand_name, industry FROM Brands
SELECT collaboration_id, influencer_id, brand_id, collaboration_date, sponsored_content FROM Collaborations
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT brand_id, brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion'
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM bloggers;
SELECT id, name, collaborations FROM influencers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, blogger_id, collaboration_type FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type='Sponsored';
SELECT id, influencer_id, blogger_id, partnership_status FROM partnerships WHERE partnership_status='Active' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC, collaborations ASC;
SELECT name, followers, collaborations FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;

SELECT influencers.name, bloggers.name, collaborations.collaboration_type FROM collaborations JOIN influencers ON collaborations.influencer_id = influencers.id JOIN bloggers ON collaborations.blogger_id = bloggers.id;

SELECT influencers.name AS influencer_name, bloggers.name AS blogger_name, partnerships.partnership_status AS status FROM partnerships JOIN influencers ON partnerships.influencer_id = influencers.id JOIN bloggers ON partnerships.blogger_id = bloggers.id;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE '%e' ORDER BY name DESC, followers ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers, email FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT website, name FROM influencers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, collaboration_date FROM collaborations WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT content_id, content_title, post_date FROM sponsored_content WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT name, email FROM influencers WHERE website IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, content_title FROM sponsored_content WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_id, brand_id FROM partnerships WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' AND brand_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY influencer_id, brand_id ASC;
